pr_title: TSK-1029: Proper distinction between delete and markForFeletion for

timeline.bodyText: This is not documented. Please include this snipped in the rest documentation.
timeline.author: mustaphazorgati

timeline.bodyText: Please properly document the distinction between marked for deletion <-> deleted. Currently there's only a snipped for marked for deletion
timeline.author: mustaphazorgati

timeline.bodyText:
You don't have to change this. This is just to show you something cool:
instead of that lambda we could use a method reference.
noneMatch("WBI:100000000000000000000000000000000007"::equals)
Personally I think this is much easier to read and should be used whenever possible.
timeline.author: mustaphazorgati

timeline.message:
TSK-1029: Proper distinction between delete and markForFeletion for
workbaskets
